text: allāhuvinṟe khajanāvukaḷ enṟe pakkaluṇṭenn ñān niṅṅaḷēāṭ paṟayunnumilla. ñān adr̥śyakāryaṁ aṟiyukayumilla. niṅṅaḷuṭe kaṇṇukaḷ nis'sāramāyi kāṇunnavarepaṟṟi, avarkk allāhu yāteāru guṇavuṁ nalkunnatēyalla ennuṁ ñān paṟayukayilla. allāhuvāṇ avaruṭe manas'sukaḷiluḷḷatineppaṟṟi nallavaṇṇaṁ aṟiyunnavan. appēāḷ (avare duṣicc paṟayunna pakṣaṁ) tīrccayāyuṁ ñān akramikaḷil peṭṭavanāyirikkuṁ
